messages.subject: Re:Diana Gabaldon books
messages.msgSnippet: ... happen to Claire and Jaime! ... Me too, me too. English books are available in Japan way after they are in bookstores in the U.S. I finally had to order
messages.messageBody:
> Well, I don't care about some dumb mystery. I want to know what's going to
happen> to Claire and Jaime!
> Hmph!
>>I'm with you!
>>Tia

Me too, me too. English books are available in Japan way after they are in
bookstores in the U.S. I finally had to order Fiery Cross from
www.powells.com and now I'm about halfway through it. Damn, it is GOOD! And
you say she's working on another one? Oh joy, oh rapture.
Now if they would just hurry up and get "Requiem for the Sun" by Elizabeth
Haydon over here, my bliss would know no bounds. Amazon.com only had it in
hard cover, I'm not quite that desperate.

Hikaru
